title: Radiance Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Raw, Thai, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of The Spa Chiangmai Resort, this natural food restaurant and juice bar is nestled into a mature mango orchard next to a swimming pools and cascading waterfall. Serves raw, vegetarian, vegan, Thai, and international cuisine using produce from both the local village as well as the resort's organic farm.
